title.rendered: Abrams for Governor to Host Celebration for High School Graduates Featuring Baby Tate

content.rendered:
ATLANTA – Today, the Abrams for Governor campaign announced that it’s hosting One Georgia Fest: Grad Edition, an event celebrating Georgia’s Class of 2022 high school graduates. The event will take place on Monday, June 6, at Terminal West in Atlanta and feature remarks from Stacey Abrams, a performance from rapper Baby Tate and appearances by special guests.
 
“Georgia’s students, educators and parents have faced major disruptions to their school and home lives throughout the pandemic,” said Stacey Abrams. “At One Georgia Fest: Grad Edition, I look forward to celebrating the accomplishments of Georgia’s high school graduates, and as governor, I am committed to supporting our children from cradle to career and ensuring they have the opportunity to thrive.”
 
“I am excited to celebrate the Class of 2022 with Stacey Abrams at One Georgia Fest: Grad Edition,” said Baby Tate. “Georgia’s high school graduates have overcome considerable challenges over the last few years to make it to this moment, and I am glad that I can play a role in giving them the celebration they deserve.”
 
This event is open to the public and the press. The public can RSVP here, and the press can RSVP here. 

###
